dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10/100 datasets contain 50K (10K) small resolution images for training (test). They are used for evaluating the performance of deep neural networks in the presence of label noise.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10/100

dcterms:creator: L. Jiang
D. Huang
M. Liu
W. Yang
dcterms:description: The mini-ImageNet dataset consists of 100 classes with 50K (5K) samples for training (validation). It is used to introduce web and symmetric in-distribution noise in a controlled manner.
dcterms:title: mini-ImageNet

dcterms:creator: W. Li
L. Wang
W. Li
E. Agustsson
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: The mini-WebVision dataset uses the top-50 classes from the Google image subset of WebVision. It is utilized for evaluating the performance of models under uncontrolled web noise.
dcterms:title: mini-WebVision
